name: Snowblind (erikdewhurst)
description:
Your dog ran off in the middle of a blizzard. She'll answer when you whistle. This might help you find your way to safety. But whistling may draw the attention of yetis in the valley. 

In this game, you're stuck in a blizzard and need to find your way to your truck. Your dog will help by barking every time you whistle (space bar). Audio directionality is a very important part of this game, so it's recommended that you play with headphones or a good pair of speakers.
